overview: Foundational shared library containing 103 classes that provide base classes (Manager, BusinessObject), dashboard DTOs (~70 classes), event management, caching, email validation, constants, file path utilities, logging, and custom exception handling. Nearly every other business module depends on this assembly.

managerPattern.description: Manager is the abstract base class for all business logic managers. BusinessObject is the abstract base for domain entities. The Manager/Info pairing (e.g., EventManager/EventInfo) is the canonical pattern used across the platform.

businessRules: Manager base class enforces stored-procedure-only database access pattern
Dashboard DTOs mirror a hierarchical UI structure: modules > sub-modules > items > scores > time series
Event logging is mandatory for audit compliance (LogEvent/LogEventDetail)
Email validation checks both general email status and CME event-specific email status
ASP.NET health monitoring tracks authentication failures and application errors
EPA (Entrustable Professional Activities) models support ACGME competency framework compliance

notes: Manager and BusinessObject are the most critical classes to map to NestJS equivalents -- every module depends on them
The ~70 dashboard DTOs in DashBoard.cs should be decomposed into domain-specific response DTOs during migration
CacheManager should map to NestJS caching module (e.g., cache-manager with Redis)
EventManager audit logging should map to a NestJS interceptor or middleware pattern
UserFriendlyException has no namespace -- ensure proper module scoping in NestJS
Constants should be migrated to TypeScript enums or const objects with proper typing
StringValue attribute pattern should be replaced with TypeScript enum-to-string utilities

nestjsEquivalents.Manager: Injectable service base class or abstract service
nestjsEquivalents.EventManager: NestJS EventEmitter or custom audit interceptor
nestjsEquivalents.Constants: TypeScript const enums or frozen objects
